thread.title: Watch out of scams on Mets and Yankees tickets
thread.title_full: Watch out of scams on Mets and Yankees tickets - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Watch out of scams on Mets and Yankees tickets
text: The Mets and Yankees are in the playoffs. That’s the good news. The bad news is that you could get scammed on tickets, Attorney General Eric Schneiderman warned. Schneiderman is asking consumers to be alert and avoid ticket scams when searching for the Mets and Yankees playoff tickets, Gannett’s Nick Muscavage reports. “New Yorkers have [...] The post Watch out of scams on Mets and Yankees tickets appeared first on Politics on the Hudson.
